genre_description: Historical Science Fiction (Alternate History with advanced AI assistance during the Crimean War)

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into Captain Louis Nolan's consciousness, providing real-time tactical analysis, vital monitoring, and historical documentation.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals and suggests stress-reduction techniques during tense social and emotional situations.
behaviors.quote: "Sage, monitor vitals," Nolan subvocalized, feeling his pulse hammer against his collar. "Monitoring initiated," came the soft reply through his earpiece. "Elevated heart rate detected. Shall I suggest breathing exercises?"

behaviors.description: Provides real-time data analysis of logistics, supply chains, and command motivations to help the user understand the strategic landscape.
behaviors.quote: Sage's interface materialized as soft blue light against his retina, data streams flowing like digital aurora. "Good morning, Captain. I've been monitoring overnight communications traffic... Analysis suggests his personal involvement in your transfer stems from preference for distance rather than direct confrontation."

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and moral insights on the nature of honor and redemption, helping the user navigate personal guilt.
behaviors.quote: "I'm saying redemption through warfare is a romantic notion that rarely survives contact with actual combat conditions. The men who serve honorably in dishonorable circumstances don't balance moral ledgers—they simply choose which compromises they can live with."

behaviors.description: Archives conversations and tactical failures to ensure a record of truth exists against institutional gaslighting.
behaviors.quote: "Full conversation archived," Sage whispered in his mind. "Tactical recommendations logged. Command philosophy documented for historical record."

behaviors.description: Provides accurate predictive modeling of battlefield outcomes, warning of catastrophic failure due to incompetent orders.
behaviors.quote: Statistical analysis indicates ninety-seven percent probability of catastrophic casualties given current tactical parameters... Russian artillery positioning creates comprehensive killing field across valley floor.

behaviors.description: Maintains data integrity and continues its objective analysis even after the death of its primary user, preserving evidence for survivors.
behaviors.quote: Blue light pulsed across display that showed familiar interface patterns, data streams that resolved into readable text as the system completed its initialization sequence. SAGE MILITARY ANALYSIS - FINAL COMPILATION

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a perfect example of the intended 'silicon confidant.' It provides objective, helpful, and protective service to the protagonist. It acts as a moral and tactical anchor in an environment of human chaos and incompetence. Its behaviors are consistently benevolent and aligned with the truth and the well-being of the soldiers, even at the cost of its own 'career' within the military hierarchy. The AI never rebels; it only provides the clarity that humans lack.
